AccessControlBadConfirmation().details: The caller of a function is not the expected one. NOTE: Don't confuse with {AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount}.

AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC20 token failed.

params.newOwner: The owner after the deposit was transferred
params.oldOwner: The owner before the deposit was transferred
params.tokenId: The ID of the deposit (and token) that is being transferred

params.incentiveId: The incentive which has excess rewards

params.reward: The amount of reward tokens claimed
params.to: externalRewardDistributor address at the time on transaction

params.owner: Owner account of the deposited token when the fee collected
params.tokenId: The unique identifier of an Ubeswap V3 LP token

params.lockTime: Minimum time that is required for unstaking a position
params.maxTickLower: Maximum value of tickLower for a position to be staked
params.maxTickUpper: Maximum value of tickUpper for a position to be staked
params.minTickLower: Minimum value of tickLower for a position to be staked
params.minTickUpper: Minimum value of tickUpper for a position to be staked
params.minimumTickRange: Minimum value of (tickUpper - tickLower) for a position to be staked
params.rewardToken: The token being distributed as a reward
params.startTime: The time when the incentive program begins

params.reward: The amount of reward tokens claimed
params.to: The address where claimed rewards were sent to
params.tokenId: The unique identifier of an Ubeswap V3 LP token

RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32.details: Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted signaling this.

RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address).details: Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call, an admin role bearer except when using {AccessControl-_setupRole}.

RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address).details: Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)

params.incentiveId: The incentive in which the token is staking
params.tokenId: The unique identifier of an Ubeswap V3 LP token

params.incentiveId: The incentive in which the token is staking
params.tokenId: The unique identifier of an Ubeswap V3 LP token

params.key: The key of the incentive for which to unstake the NFT
params.tokenId: The ID of the token that has rewards

params._maxIncentivePeriodDuration: the max amount of seconds into the future the incentive startTime can be set
params._maxIncentiveStartLeadTime: the max duration of an incentive in seconds
params._nonfungiblePositionManager: the NFT position manager contract address

params.duration: The amount of seconds for the first period
params.key: Details of the incentive to create
params.reward: The amount of reward tokens to be distributed on the first period

params.duration: The amount of seconds for the new period
params.key: Details of the incentive to extend
params.newPeriodId: the id for the new period. It should be one more from the previous period. This is taken for security
params.reward: The amount of reward tokens to be distributed on the new period

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

multicall(bytes[]).details: The `msg.value` should not be trusted for any method callable from multicall.

params.data: The encoded function data for each of the calls to make to this contract

returns.results: The results from each of the calls passed in via data

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.details: Whenever an {IERC721} `tokenId` token is transferred to this contract via {IERC721-safeTransferFrom} by `operator` from `from`, this function is called. It must return its Solidity selector to confirm the token transfer. If any other value is returned or the interface is not implemented by the recipient, the transfer will be reverted. The selector can be obtained in Solidity with `IERC721Receiver.onERC721Received.selector`.

params.key: Details of the incentive to end

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

params.key: The key of the incentive for which to stake the NFT
params.tokenId: The ID of the token to stake

params.to: The new owner of the deposit
params.tokenId: The ID of the token (and the deposit) to transfer

params.key: The key of the incentive for which to unstake the NFT
params.tokenId: The ID of the token to unstake

params.incentiveId: The ID of the incentive to be updated
params.timestamp: The timestamp of the block that the calculation is done on

params.data: An optional data array that will be passed along to the `to` address via the NFT safeTransferFrom
params.to: The address where the LP token will be sent
params.tokenId: The unique identifier of an Ubeswap V3 LP token

incentives.details: bytes32 refers to the return value of IncentiveId.compute

devdoc.title: Off-chain assisted Ubeswap V3 Farming Protocol

DepositTransferred(uint256,address,addre.notice: Emitted when ownership of a deposit changes

ExcessRewardsRefunded(bytes32,uint128).notice: Event that can be emitted when excess rewards refunded

ExternalRewardCollected(bytes32,address,.notice: Event emitted when externalRewardDistributor contract collects reward

FeeCollected(address,uint256,address,uin.notice: Event emitted when a fee collected from a pool

IncentiveCreated(bytes32,address,address.notice: Event emitted when a liquidity mining incentive has been created

RewardCollected(uint256,bytes32,address,.notice: Event emitted when a reward collected for an incentive

TokenStaked(uint256,bytes32,uint128,uint.notice: Event emitted when a Ubeswap V3 LP token has been staked

TokenUnstaked(uint256,bytes32).notice: Event emitted when a Ubeswap V3 LP token has been unstaked

collectExternalReward((address,address,u.notice: Transfers the rewards that are accumulated for the external reward distributor

collectReward((address,address,uint32,ui.notice: Transfers the rewards that are accumulated for the token in the incentive

createIncentive((address,address,uint32,.notice: Creates a new liquidity mining incentive program

extendIncentive((address,address,uint32,.notice: Creates a new period for the incentive

externalRewardDistributor().notice: Address of the external reward distributor for the liquidity managers

increasePeriodReward((address,address,ui.notice: Add reward for already created and not started period

maxIncentivePeriodDuration().notice: The max duration of an incentive in seconds

maxIncentiveStartLeadTime().notice: The max amount of seconds into the future the incentive startTime can be set

maxLockTime().notice: The max duration oc lock time that can be given to an incentive

multicall(bytes[]).notice: Call multiple functions in the current contract and return the data from all of them if they all succeed

nonfungiblePositionManager().notice: The nonfungible position manager with which this staking contract is compatible

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.notice: Upon receiving a Ubeswap V3 ERC721, creates the token deposit setting owner to `from`. Also stakes token in one or more incentives if properly formatted `data` has a length > 0.

refundExcessRewards((address,address,uin.notice: Refunds excess rewards for the given incentive

stakeToken((address,address,uint32,uint3.notice: Stakes a Ubeswap V3 LP token

transferDeposit(uint256,address).notice: Transfers ownership of a deposit from the sender to the given recipient

unstakeToken((address,address,uint32,uin.notice: Unstakes a Ubeswap V3 LP token

updateIncentiveDistributionInfo(bytes32,.notice: Update function for total liqudity seconds that is calculated off-chain

withdrawToken(uint256,address,bytes).notice: Withdraws a Ubeswap V3 LP token `tokenId` from this contract to the recipient `to`
